position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-operator"><</span><span class="cm-variable">html</span><span class="cm-operator">><</span><span class="cm-variable">head</span><span class="cm-operator">><</span><span class="cm-variable">title</span><span class="cm-operator">></span><span class="cm-variable">The</span> <span class="cm-variable">Dormouse</span><span class="cm-string">'s story</title></head></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-operator"><</span><span class="cm-variable">p</span> <span class="cm-keyword">class</span>=<span class="cm-string">"title"</span><span class="cm-operator">><</span><span class="cm-variable">b</span><span class="cm-operator">></span><span class="cm-variable">The</span> <span class="cm-variable">Dormouse</span><span class="cm-string">'s story</b></p></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>HTML解析器把这段字符串转换成一连串的事件: “打开</span><html><span>标签”,”打开一个</span><head><span>标签”,”打开一个</span><title><span>标签”,”添加一段字符串”,”关闭</span><title><span>标签”,”打开</span><p><span>标签”,等等.Beautiful Soup提供了重现解析器初始化过程的方法.</span></p><h4><a name="nextelement-和-previouselement" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>.next_element 和 .previous_element</span></h4><p><code>.next_element</code><span> 属性指向解析过程中下一个被解析的对象(字符串或tag),结果可能与 </span><code>.next_sibling</code><span> 相同,但通常是不一样的.</span></p><p><span>这是“爱丽丝”文档中最后一个</span><a><span>标签,它的 </span><code>.next_sibling</code><span> 结果是一个字符串,因为当前的解析过程 [</span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id89'><span>2</span><span>]</span></a><span> 因为当前的解析过程因为遇到了</span><a><span>标签而中断了:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>6</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span> = <span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find</span>(<span class="cm-string">"a"</span>, <span class="cm-builtin">id</span>=<span class="cm-string">"link3"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <a class="sister" href="http://example.com/tillie" id="link3">Tillie</a></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span cm-text="">​</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">next_sibling</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">6</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># '; and they lived at the bottom of a well.'</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 138px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 138px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>但这个</span><a><span>标签的 </span><code>.next_element</code><span> 属性结果是在</span><a><span>标签被解析之后的解析内容,不是</span><a><span>标签后的句子部分,应该是字符串”Tillie”:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">next_element</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'Tillie'</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>这是因为在原始文档中,字符串“Tillie” 在分号前出现,解析器先进入</span><a><span>标签,然后是字符串“Tillie”,然后关闭</span></a><span>标签,然后是分号和剩余部分.分号与</span><a><span>标签在同一层级,但是字符串“Tillie”会被先解析.</span></p><p><code>.previous_element</code><span> 属性刚好与 </span><code>.next_element</code><span> 相反,它指向当前被解析的对象的前一个解析对象:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>4</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">previous_element</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u' and\n'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">previous_element</span>.<span class="cm-property">next_element</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <a class="sister" href="http://example.com/tillie" id="link3">Tillie</a></span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 92px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 92px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h4><a name="nextelements-和-previouselements" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>.next_elements 和 .previous_elements</span></h4><p><span>通过 </span><code>.next_elements</code><span> 和 </span><code>.previous_elements</code><span> 的迭代器就可以向前或向后访问文档的解析内容,就好像文档正在被解析一样:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>9</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">for</span> <span class="cm-variable">element</span> <span class="cm-keyword">in</span> <span class="cm-variable">last_a_tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">next_elements</span>:</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;">    <span class="cm-builtin">print</span>(<span class="cm-builtin">repr</span>(<span class="cm-variable">element</span>))</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'Tillie'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u';\nand they lived at the bottom of a well.'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'\n\n'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">6</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <p class="story">...</p></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">7</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'...'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">8</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'\n'</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">9</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># None</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 207px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 207px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h2><a name="搜索文档树" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>搜索文档树</span></h2><p><span>Beautiful Soup定义了很多搜索方法,这里着重介绍2个: </span><code>find()</code><span> 和 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> .其它方法的参数和用法类似,请读者举一反三.</span></p><p><span>再以“爱丽丝”文档作为例子:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python" style="break-inside: unset;"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 53.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 39px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>16</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px; width: 39px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">html_doc</span> = <span class="cm-string">"""</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><html><head><title>The Dormouse's story</title></head></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><body></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><p class="title"><b>The Dormouse's story</b></p></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span cm-text="">​</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">6</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><p class="story">Once upon a time there were three little sisters; and their names were</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">7</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><a href="http://example.com/elsie" class="sister" id="link1">Elsie</a>,</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">8</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><a href="http://example.com/lacie" class="sister" id="link2">Lacie</a> and</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">9</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><a href="http://example.com/tillie" class="sister" id="link3">Tillie</a>;</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">10</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string">and they lived at the bottom of a well.</p></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">11</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span cm-text="">​</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">12</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string"><p class="story">...</p></span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">13</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-string">"""</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">14</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span cm-text="">​</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">15</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">from</span> <span class="cm-variable">bs4</span> <span class="cm-keyword">import</span> <span class="cm-variable">BeautifulSoup</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">16</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span> = <span class="cm-variable">BeautifulSoup</span>(<span class="cm-variable">html_doc</span>, <span class="cm-string">'html.parser'</span>)</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 391px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 391px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 34px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>使用 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> 类似的方法可以查找到想要查找的文档内容.</span></p><h3><a name="过滤器" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>过滤器</span></h3><p><span>介绍 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> 方法前,先介绍一下过滤器的类型 [</span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id90'><span>3</span><span>]</span></a><span> ,这些过滤器贯穿整个搜索的API.过滤器可以被用在tag的name中,节点的属性中,字符串中或他们的混合中.</span></p><h4><a name="字符串" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>字符串</span></h4><p><span>最简单的过滤器是字符串.在搜索方法中传入一个字符串参数,Beautiful Soup会查找与字符串完整匹配的内容,下面的例子用于查找文档中所有的</span><b><span>标签:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-string">'b'</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<b>The Dormouse's story</b>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>如果传入字节码参数,Beautiful Soup会当作UTF-8编码,可以传入一段Unicode 编码来避免Beautiful Soup解析编码出错</span></p><h4><a name="正则表达式" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>正则表达式</span></h4><p><span>如果传入正则表达式作为参数,Beautiful Soup会通过正则表达式的 </span><code>match()</code><span> 来匹配内容.下面例子中找出所有以b开头的标签,这表示</span><body><span>和</span><b><span>标签都应该被找到:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>5</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">import</span> <span class="cm-variable">re</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">for</span> <span class="cm-variable">tag</span> <span class="cm-keyword">in</span> <span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">re</span>.<span class="cm-property">compile</span>(<span class="cm-string">"^b"</span>)):</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;">    <span class="cm-builtin">print</span>(<span class="cm-variable">tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">name</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># body</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># b</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 115px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 115px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>下面代码找出所有名字中包含”t”的标签:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 92px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 92px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h4><a name="列表" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>列表</span></h4><p><span>如果传入列表参数,Beautiful Soup会将与列表中任一元素匹配的内容返回.下面代码找到文档中所有</span><a><span>标签和</span><b><span>标签:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>5</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>([<span class="cm-string">"a"</span>, <span class="cm-string">"b"</span>])</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <a class="sister" href="http://example.com/tillie" id="link3">Tillie</a>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 115px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 115px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h4><a name="true" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>True</span></h4><p><code>True</code><span> 可以匹配任何值,下面代码查找到所有的tag,但是不会返回字符串节点</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 53.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 39px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>13</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px; width: 39px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">for</span> <span class="cm-variable">tag</span> <span class="cm-keyword">in</span> <span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-keyword">True</span>):</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;">    <span class="cm-builtin">print</span>(<span class="cm-variable">tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">name</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># html</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># head</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">5</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># title</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">6</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># body</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">7</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># p</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">8</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># b</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">9</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># p</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">10</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># a</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">11</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># a</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">12</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># a</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">13</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># p</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 299px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 299px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 34px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h4><a name="方法" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>方法</span></h4><p><span>如果没有合适过滤器,那么还可以定义一个方法,方法只接受一个元素参数 [</span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id91'><span>4</span><span>]</span></a><span> ,如果这个方法返回 </span><code>True</code><span> 表示当前元素匹配并且被找到,如果不是则反回 </span><code>False</code></p><p><span>下面方法校验了当前元素,如果包含 </span><code>class</code><span> 属性却不包含 </span><code>id</code><span> 属性,那么将返回 </span><code>True</code><span>:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">def</span> <span class="cm-def">has_class_but_no_id</span>(<span class="cm-variable">tag</span>):</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;">    <span class="cm-keyword">return</span> <span class="cm-variable">tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">has_attr</span>(<span class="cm-string">'class'</span>) <span class="cm-keyword">and</span> <span class="cm-keyword">not</span> <span class="cm-variable">tag</span>.<span class="cm-property">has_attr</span>(<span class="cm-string">'id'</span>)</span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>将这个方法作为参数传入 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> 方法,将得到所有</span><p><span>标签:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>4</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">has_class_but_no_id</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<p class="title"><b>The Dormouse's story</b></p>,</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <p class="story">Once upon a time there were...</p>,</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation" style=""><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px; width: 39px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-string">"title"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-string">"p"</span>, <span class="cm-string">"title"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">7</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-string">"a"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">12</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-builtin">id</span>=<span class="cm-string">"link2"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">13</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<a class="sister" href="http://example.com/lacie" id="link2">Lacie</a>]</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">14</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span cm-text="">​</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">15</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-keyword">import</span> <span class="cm-variable">re</span></span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">16</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find</span>(<span class="cm-variable">string</span>=<span class="cm-variable">re</span>.<span class="cm-property">compile</span>(<span class="cm-string">"sisters"</span>))</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">17</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># u'Once upon a time there were three little sisters; and their names were\n'</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 391px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 391px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 34px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>有几个方法很相似,还有几个方法是新的,参数中的 </span><code>string</code><span> 和 </span><code>id</code><span> 是什么含义? 为什么 </span><code>find_all("p", "title")</code><span> 返回的是CSS Class为”title”的</span><p><span>标签? 我们来仔细看一下 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> 的参数</span></p><h4><a name="name-参数" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>name 参数</span></h4><p><code>name</code><span> 参数可以查找所有名字为 </span><code>name</code><span> 的tag,字符串对象会被自动忽略掉.</span></p><p><span>简单的用法如下:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-string">"title"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<title>The Dormouse's story</title>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>重申: 搜索 </span><code>name</code><span> 参数的值可以使任一类型的 </span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id28'><span>过滤器</span></a><span> ,字符窜,正则表达式,列表,方法或是 </span><code>True</code><span> .</span></p><h4><a name="keyword-参数" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>keyword 参数</span></h4><p><span>如果一个指定名字的参数不是搜索内置的参数名,搜索时会把该参数当作指定名字tag的属性来搜索,如果包含一个名字为 </span><code>id</code><span> 的参数,Beautiful Soup会搜索每个tag的”id”属性.</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-builtin">id</span>=<span class="cm-string">'link2'</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>搜索指定名字的属性时可以使用的参数值包括 </span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id30'><span>字符串</span></a><span> , </span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id31'><span>正则表达式</span></a><span> , </span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#id32'><span>列表</span></a><span>, </span><a href='https://beautifulsoup.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/v4.4.0/#true'><span>True</span></a><span> .</span></p><p><span>下面的例子在文档树中查找所有包含 </span><code>id</code><span> 属性的tag,无论 </span><code>id</code><span> 的值是什么:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>4</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-builtin">id</span>=<span class="cm-keyword">True</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># <a class="sister" href="http://example.com/tillie" id="link3">Tillie</a>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 92px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 92px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>使用多个指定名字的参数可以同时过滤tag的多个属性:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">href</span>=<span class="cm-variable">re</span>.<span class="cm-property">compile</span>(<span class="cm-string">"elsie"</span>), <span class="cm-builtin">id</span>=<span class="cm-string">'link1'</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<a class="sister" href="http://example.com/elsie" id="link1">three</a>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>有些tag属性在搜索不能使用,比如HTML5中的 data-* 属性:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>3</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">data_soup</span> = <span class="cm-variable">BeautifulSoup</span>(<span class="cm-string">'<div data-foo="value">foo!</div>'</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">data_soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">data</span><span class="cm-operator">-</span><span class="cm-variable">foo</span>=<span class="cm-string">"value"</span>)</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">3</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># SyntaxError: keyword can't be an expression</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 69px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 69px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><p><span>但是可以通过 </span><code>find_all()</code><span> 方法的 </span><code>attrs</code><span> 参数定义一个字典参数来搜索包含特殊属性的tag:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>2</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; z-index: 1;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-code" role="presentation"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline" style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-activeline-background CodeMirror-linebackground"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-background CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px; width: 31px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper CodeMirror-activeline-gutter" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">1</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">data_soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">attrs</span>={<span class="cm-string">"data-foo"</span>: <span class="cm-string">"value"</span>})</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -31px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt CodeMirror-linenumber-show" style="left: 3px; width: 18px;">2</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-comment"># [<div data-foo="value">foo!</div>]</span></span></pre></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="position: absolute; height: 0px; width: 1px; border-bottom: 0px solid transparent; top: 46px;"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutters" style="height: 46px;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter CodeMirror-linenumbers" style="width: 26px;"></div></div></div></div></pre><h4><a name="按css搜索" class="md-header-anchor"></a><span>按CSS搜索</span></h4><p><span>按照CSS类名搜索tag的功能非常实用,但标识CSS类名的关键字 </span><code>class</code><span> 在Python中是保留字,使用 </span><code>class</code><span> 做参数会导致语法错误.从Beautiful Soup的4.1.1版本开始,可以通过 </span><code>class_</code><span> 参数搜索有指定CSS类名的tag:</span></p><pre spellcheck="false" class="md-fences md-end-block md-fences-with-lineno ty-contain-cm modeLoaded" lang="python"><div class="CodeMirror cm-s-inner CodeMirror-wrap" lang="python"><div style="overflow: hidden; position: relative; width: 3px; height: 0px; top: 11.25px; left: 45.25px;"><textarea autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false" tabindex="0" style="position: absolute; bottom: -1em; padding: 0px; width: 1000px; height: 1em; outline: none;"></textarea></div><div class="CodeMirror-scrollbar-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-filler" cm-not-content="true"></div><div class="CodeMirror-scroll" tabindex="-1"><div class="CodeMirror-sizer" style="margin-left: 31px; margin-bottom: 0px; border-right-width: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px;"><div style="position: relative; top: 0px;"><div class="CodeMirror-lines" role="presentation"><div role="presentation" style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>4</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; outline: none;"><div class="CodeMirror-measure"><pre><span>xxxxxxxxxx</span></pre><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt"><div>15</div></div></div><div class="CodeMirror-measure"></div><div style="position: relative; width: 26px;">4</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">string</span>=[<span class="cm-string">"Tillie"</span>, <span class="cm-string">"Elsie"</span>, <span class="cm-string">"Lacie"</span>])</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">7</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;"><span class="cm-variable">soup</span>.<span class="cm-property">find_all</span>(<span class="cm-variable">string</span>=<span class="cm-variable">re</span>.<span class="cm-property">compile</span>(<span class="cm-string">"Dormouse"</span>))</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px; width: 26px;">8</div></div><pre class=" CodeMirror-line " role="presentation"><span role="presentation" style="padding-right: 0.1px;">[<span class="cm-string">u"The Dormouse's story"</span>, <span class="cm-string">u"The Dormouse's story"</span>]</span></pre></div><div style="position: relative;"><div class="CodeMirror-gutter-wrapper" style="left: -39px;"><div class="CodeMirror-linenumber CodeMirror-gutter-elt" style="left: 3px;
